A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This move was awful the first time I saw it. The mess of a plot\, the lack of charachter development\, Leah Poppins\, what they did with the character of Luke Skywalker\, the pointless subplots\,  I could go on and on.  By any measure this is fundamentally a bad movie.  I honestly tried to watch it again during an international flight but could not get past the holding for Hux scene.
